snippet: The Haqqani network is responsible for some of the deadliest attacks against American troops in Afghanistan, and the Obama administration has deemed it a terrorist organization.
abstract: American officials say the Obama administration has decided to blacklist as a terrorist organization the Haqqani network, the militant organization responsible for some of the deadliest attacks against American troops in Afghanistan
lead_paragraph: The Haqqani network is responsible for some of the deadliest attacks against American troops in Afghanistan, and the Obama administration has deemed it a terrorist organization.

headline.main: White House Backs Blacklisting Militant Organization
headline.print_headline: White House Backs Blacklisting Militant Organization
